TopicTitle: We're partnering up with Eucl3d to bring your KSP creations to the real world

Articles.Content:
We're proud to announce that we're partnering up with Eucl3d, which will allow our players to 3D print your creations.

![SBdcMk4.png](http://i.imgur.com/SBdcMk4.png)

We plan for this to be accessible through an ingame menu, but in the meantime, you can get started this very Friday the 27th with just a .craft file on [https://eucl3d.com/ksp](https://eucl3d.com/ksp)

I know you must have a ton of questions regarding this project, so to address this, /u/eucl3d will be holding an AMA on [www.reddit.com/r/KerbalSpaceProgram/](www.reddit.com/r/KerbalSpaceProgram/) to clear all doubts and explain everything on the same date!

In the meantime, feel free to sign up for their newsletter on [https://eucl3d.com/ksp](https://eucl3d.com/ksp)
